snippet.title: Official Riddick: The Merc Files - Rule the Dark Trailer
snippet.description:
Riddick: The Merc Files by Gaming Corps

Be Riddick - the iconic antihero - and avoid the mercenaries that hunt you across the stars. Escape them, trick them, or eliminate them. It's your choice.

** NOT COMPATIBLE WITH THE iPhone 4 OR iPod Touch 4th GENERATION **

Be Riddick - the iconic antihero - and avoid the bounty hunters that tracked you down across the stars. Escape them, trick them, or eliminate them; you choose your own path in this touch-based stealth action game from the creators of "Chronicles of Riddick: Escape from Butcher Bay".

You are not afraid of the dark, are you?

*Situation-based game play: complete the objectives in your own way
*New content released regularly
*Upload your gameplay video in-game and share it with your friends
*Optimized controls- developed specifically for the mobile format

STAY IN THE SHADOWS OR FIGHT YOUR WAY THROUGH
Complete your objectives by staying hidden, or take out your enemies using stealth, melee counter-attacks or using firearms.

MOBILE GAMEPLAY
A mobile game made for mobile devices. Use only two fingers on one hand and experience gameplay with both depth and accessibility.

NEW CONTENT RELEASED REGULARLY
Packages with new levels and features will be released on a regular basis. All new features will expand gameplay possibilities and keep the game fresh.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/riddicktmf

Check out our videos: http://www.youtube.com/user/riddickthegame

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/riddicktmf

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/nz/app/riddick-the-merc-files/id680524466

Homepage:

http://www.gamingcorps.com/
